title: Theeyil Vizhundha Song Lyrics Varalaaru
stanzas:
Theeyil vizhundha thaena
ivan Theeyil vadintha thaena
thaayai kaakkum mahanaa
illai thaayumaanavanaa (2)

Mazhaiyin neer vaangi
mazhaiye azhuvadhu pol
thaayin uyir thaangi
thanayan azhuvaana

thangam pole irundhavalthaan
sarugai pole aanathanala
singam pole irundha magan
sevuliyai pole aavaanaa

Or sollil or ulagam amma
ammaa
ulagellaam or sollum ammaa(2)

nee sumandha pillaiyaai
naan irundhen ammaa
naan sumakkum pillaiyaai
nee aanaai ammaa

enaku yaedhum aanadhunna
unaku veru pillai undu
unaikaedhum aanadhunnaa
enakku veru thaayirukkaa ?

nenjai ootti valarthavalai
kannil maniyaai sumandhavalai
mannil vittu viduvaanaa
manadhil mattum sumappaanaa

thaayin madithaane
ulagam thodangumidam
thaayin kaaladiye
ulagam mudiyum idam

karunai thaayin ninaivinile
kallum konjam azhudhuvidum
kanneer thuligalin vegathile
kannin manigalum vilundhuvidum

Theeyil vizhundha thaena
ivan Theeyil vadintha thaena
thaayai kaakkum mahanaa
illai thaayumaanavanaa

seo.title: Theeyil Vizhundha Song Lyrics Varalaaru

seo.keywords: Vairamuthu, Varalaaru, AR Rahman, AR Rahman, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
